duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership in clinical programming, team building, patient satisfaction, and faculty engagement.
Ensure effective functioning of Kingswood Hospital's psychiatric units.
Oversee the transition of patients and staff to the new hospital in West Bloomfield, MI.
Collaborate with Michigan State University medical students and psychiatry residents.

education_certification.credential: American Board of Psychiatry certified adult or child psychiatrist. Board eligible candidates must be certified in the first three years of employment.
